attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
make it ilegal for anyone to obtain someones email address or personal details for the purpose of sending spam or unsolicited emails.
or for any website to pass on someones email address.

rejection.details: Spam email is already illegal. See: http://www.ico.gov.uk/for_the_public/topic_specific_guides/spam_emails.aspx
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
